name: Live Escape
description:
Live Escape is a horror game set in the mind of the main character. Puzzles, escape and correctly made choices will allow you to get out of the trap created by the head. Is everything an illusion? Can things happening in your head have an impact on reality?

  • Try to get out
  • Follow your instincts
  • Be careful
  • Find out as much as possible
  • Be ready to make decisions

Can you overcome your own thoughts?
